About.About1: Nitte Mahalinga Adyantaya Memorial Institute of Technology (NMAMIT), Nitte, established in 1986 and recognized by the All-India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi,  is a part of the Nitte (Deemed to be University), Mangaluru, since June 2022
About.About2: NMAMIT is placed in the Rank band 151-200 in the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) 2024 by the Ministry of Education, Government of India. NMAMIT, the off-campus centre of Nitte DU located at Nitte Village, has active collaborations with several international universities and organizations for faculty and student exchanges, research, internships and placements. The Institute offers UG engineering program in fourteen disciplines, PG M.Tech. program in seven disciplines & an MCA program. All the departments have qualified research guides for students interested in taking up research work leading to Ph.D. For more details, visit www.nitte.edu.in/nmamit
About.Description: Meet the people behind the scenes

Home.AboutContent: Immerse yourself in the fusion of tradition and innovation as our dedicated team invites select participants to be part of this unique Yakshagana competition. This one-of-a-kind competition seamlessly integrates centuries-old storytelling with a modern approach, all while preserving the essence of this beloved folk art. Join us on this transformative journey where ancient narratives and the rich heritage of Yakshagana meets a contemporary context of technology for better experience and transparency.
Home.q1: Is Yakshagavishti open for all teams?&No, unfortunately this is for invited colleges only.
Home.q2: When will Yakshagavishti be conducted?&Yakshagavishti will be on Saturday, April 12th, 2025
Home.q3: Do we have to physically register again on the day of competition?&No; teams only need to verify their registrations.
Home.q4_q: Where and how can I access the rule book and Prasanga Padya list?
Home.q4_ans: It can be downloaded directly from the website &here&
Home.q5: Can anyone attend Yakshagavishti as an audience member?&Yes. Anyone can be an audience member; you're most welcome for the event!

Achievements.Heading: Achievements
Achievements.Team1: In just a year since our inception, Team Yakshasangama has emerged as a promising team of young artists across the off centre campus of Nitte DU, securing champion titles in four out of six competitions and numerous individual prizes.
Achievements.Team2: Our passion for Yakshagana fuels our journey, and we are excited to continue this remarkable ascent in the world of this cherished art form.

1st-edition.Description1: The Yakshagana competition, titled 'Yakshagavishti', was organized by a technical college for the first time, featuring the episode 'Bheeshma Prathijne' and innovative measures such as online registration and paperless jury evaluations to ensure fairness. To maintain impartial judging, complete anonymity was enforced throughout the evaluation process.
1st-edition.Description2: Five teams participated in the event: Alvas College (Moodubidire), SDM Law College (Mangalore), Dr. P. Dayananda Pai - P. Satisha Pai Government First Grade College (Mangalore), Govinda Dasa Degree College (Surathkal), and S.D.P.T. First Grade College (Kateel). This marked a significant milestone as the first full-fledged Yakshagana competition of its kind
